success.title: Payment successfully noted
success.description:
The payment got marked covered at the payment provider.
As soon as the landlord accepts the request, the money will be disbursed. If you cancel the booking the payment will not be executed.

error.title: Error while checkout
error.description:
It seems as if there were problems when checking out. If you cancelled the payment, you can ignore this message.
Otherwise please contact our Support.
